title: Café Selfie with Coffee and Dessert
caption: Two friends smile for a selfie at an outdoor café table with hot drinks and a slice of cake.

image.alt: Two friends take a selfie at a café table with coffee drinks, a dessert, and sunglasses in front of them.

fullDescription.en: Two friends sit at an outdoor café table and take a selfie with a smartphone. They lean close together and smile, showing a warm and comfortable friendship. On the table, there are two hot drinks that look like coffee or cappuccino, a slice of dessert on a small plate, and a pair of sunglasses. The background is softly blurred with warm lights, suggesting an evening setting in a lively street café where people relax and socialize.
fullDescription.fa: Two friends sit at outdoor café table and take selfie with smartphone. آن‌ها lean close together and smile, showing warm and comfortable friendship. On table, there are two hot drinks that look like coffee or cappuccino, slice of dessert on small plate, and pair of sunglasses. background is softly blurred with warm lights, suggesting evening setting in lively street café where people relax and socialize.

intermediateEnglish.en: Two young women are sitting together at an outdoor café and taking a selfie with a smartphone. They are leaning close and smiling, which shows they are comfortable with each other. On the table, there are two cups of coffee and a slice of dessert, and sunglasses are placed near the edge. Warm lights in the background make the scene feel cozy and social.

advancedEnglish.en: This photo captures a casual social moment as two friends take a selfie at a street café. Their close posture and natural smiles suggest a strong friendship and an enjoyable conversation. The table includes two coffee drinks, a small dessert, and sunglasses, which hints that they are taking a break and relaxing. The warm, blurred lights in the background create a cozy atmosphere, possibly in the evening when cafés become busier. After taking the photo, they will probably continue chatting and enjoy their drinks before leaving.

scenarios.title: A memory
scenarios.en: Last weekend, I found myself at outdoor café / street café. Two friends smile for a selfie at an outdoor café table with hot drinks and a slice of cake. At first, I noticed smartphone, coffee cups, latte/cappuccino and the way people were taking a selfie. Then I looked closer: their clothing (headscarves (black and brown), denim jackets) and their expressions made the scene feel happy, relaxed, friendly. After that, something small happened that changed the mood, and we had to respond quickly. In the end, we solved it, and the moment became a story I still remember.
scenarios.fa: آخرِ هفته‌ی قبل outdoor café / street café بودم. Two friends smile for a selfie at an outdoor café table with hot drinks and a slice of cake. اول smartphone، coffee cups و latte/cappuccino را دیدم و اینکه آدم‌ها چطور taking a selfie. بعد دقیق‌تر نگاه کردم: لباس‌ها (headscarves (black and brown) و denim jackets) و حالت چهره‌ها باعث شد فضا happy، relaxed و friendly به نظر برسد. بعدش یک اتفاق کوچک افتاد که حال‌وهوا را عوض کرد و مجبور شدیم سریع واکنش نشان بدهیم. آخرش حلش کردیم و همان لحظه تبدیل شد به خاطره‌ای که هنوز یادم می‌ماند.

grammarUsed.en: Past simple with time marker (last weekend) and sequencing (at first/then/after that/in the end).
grammarUsed.fa: گذشته ساده با قید زمان و ترتیب رخدادها (اول/بعد/بعدش/آخرش).

en.tense: Past Simple (V2) to tell a short memory, plus sequencing words (first/then/finally).
sentenceStructure: Time markers: yesterday / last week / a few minutes ago.
howToBuild: Start with a time phrase: Yesterday, Last weekend, A few minutes ago…
Change the main action into past simple (reviewed, chose, played…).
Use sequencing words to make a clear story: first, then, after that, finally.
End with a result or feeling: Everyone felt… / It turned out…
examples: Yesterday, the friends took a selfie.
Then, the friends checked smartphone and continued.
Finally, they felt happy about the outcome.

fa.tense: گذشته ساده (Past Simple) برای تعریف یک خاطره کوتاه، همراه با کلمات ترتیب‌دهنده (first/then/finally).
sentenceStructure: عبارات زمانی: yesterday / last week / a few minutes ago
howToBuild: با یک عبارت زمانی شروع کن: Yesterday, Last weekend, A few minutes ago…
فعل اصلی را به گذشته ساده تبدیل کن (reviewed, chose, played…).
از کلمات ترتیب‌دهنده استفاده کن: first, then, after that, finally.
با نتیجه یا حس تمام کن: Everyone felt… / It turned out…
examples: دیروز، The friends took a selfie.
بعد، The friends smartphone را بررسی کرد و ادامه داد.
در نهایت، آن‌ها درباره نتیجه happy بودند.

scenarios.title: Reflection
scenarios.en: Over the past few months, I have started paying attention to scenes like this. I have noticed that details such as smartphone, coffee cups, latte/cappuccino, dessert slice are not background; they guide the story. I have also learned how actions like smiling can signal feelings such as happy, relaxed, friendly. Since then, I have taken more time to observe before I speak, and my descriptions have become clearer and more specific.
scenarios.fa: در چند ماه گذشته شروع کرده‌ام به صحنه‌هایی مثل این بیشتر دقت کنم. متوجه شده‌ام جزئیاتی مثل smartphone، coffee cups، latte/cappuccino و dessert slice فقط «پس‌زمینه» نیستند؛ آن‌ها مسیر داستان را تعیین می‌کنند. همچنین یاد گرفته‌ام کارهایی مثل smiling چطور می‌تواند احساساتی مثل happy، relaxed و friendly را نشان بدهد. از آن زمان بیشتر قبل از حرف زدن مشاهده می‌کنم و توصیف‌هایم واضح‌تر و دقیق‌تر شده است.

grammarUsed.en: Present perfect to connect past learning to the present, plus since/over the past to frame experience.
grammarUsed.fa: حال کامل برای وصل کردن یادگیری گذشته به حال، همراه با «در چند ماه گذشته/از آن زمان».

en.tense: Present Perfect (have/has + past participle) to connect past experience to the present; use since/for/already/yet.
howToBuild: Say what has happened up to now (experience/result).
Use since (a starting point) or for (a duration).
Add a contrast or reflection: however, although, even though.
Finish with what they are doing now (present continuous) if needed.
examples: The friends have already handled similar situations before.
The friends have learned to stay happy in outdoor café / street café.
Although it looks routine, the details have mattered.

fa.tense: حال کامل (have/has + شکل سوم فعل) برای ربط دادن گذشته به حال؛ همراه با since/for/already/yet.
howToBuild: بگو تا همین الآن چه تجربه/نتیجه‌ای اتفاق افتاده.
از since (نقطه شروع) یا for (مدت زمان) استفاده کن.
یک جمله‌ی بازتاب/تضاد اضافه کن: however, although, even though.
اگر لازم شد با یک جمله حال استمراری وضعیت الآن را بگو.
examples: The friends قبلاً موقعیت‌های مشابهی را تجربه کرده است.
The friends یاد گرفته است در outdoor café / street café happy بماند.
اگرچه کار روتین به نظر می‌رسد، جزئیات مهم بوده‌اند.

scenarios.title: A challenge
scenarios.en: If we were to replay this moment at outdoor café / street café, one small change could create a big problem. If smartphone, coffee cups had been missing or damaged, we would have had to improvise. Someone might have said, “We should slow down and check,” and another person could have replied that we were running out of time. In a situation like this, we should prioritize safety and clarity, even if it means changing the plan. If I had ignored those details, I might have misunderstood the whole scene.
scenarios.fa: اگر قرار بود این لحظه در outdoor café / street café دوباره تکرار شود، یک تغییر کوچک می‌توانست یک مشکل بزرگ بسازد. اگر smartphone و coffee cups نبود یا آسیب دیده بود، مجبور می‌شدیم بداهه تصمیم بگیریم. ممکن بود کسی بگوید «باید آهسته‌تر برویم و بررسی کنیم» و نفر دیگری جواب بدهد که وقت کم داریم. در چنین موقعیتی بهتر است ایمنی و شفافیت را در اولویت بگذاریم، حتی اگر مجبور شویم برنامه را تغییر بدهیم. اگر آن جزئیات را نادیده می‌گرفتم، شاید کل صحنه را اشتباه می‌فهمیدم.

grammarUsed.en: Conditionals for hypotheticals, modals for advice/possibility, and short reported speech (might have said/could have replied).
grammarUsed.fa: شرطی‌ها برای موقعیت فرضی، افعال کمکی برای امکان/پیشنهاد، و نقل‌قول غیرمستقیم برای بازگویی گفت‌وگو.

en.tense: Mixed grammar for higher-level storytelling: conditionals, modals (might/must), and reported speech.
sentenceStructure: Second conditional: If + past simple, would + base verb.
Third conditional: If + had + V3, would have + V3.
Modals of deduction: might/must/can't + base verb.
Reported speech: He said (that) … / She asked if …
howToBuild: Describe the challenge and add a hypothetical solution (If…, would…).
Use modals to infer causes from the photo (They might…, It must…).
Add reported speech for realism: Someone said that…
Finish with a consequence or lesson learned.
examples: If the friends had checked smartphone earlier, they would have avoided a mistake.
They might be under pressure, but they must stay happy.
The supervisor said that every detail mattered.

fa.tense: گرامر ترکیبی سطح بالا: شرطی‌ها، افعال کمکی (might/must) و نقل قول غیرمستقیم (reported speech).
sentenceStructure: شرطی نوع دوم: If + past simple, would + فعل ساده.
شرطی نوع سوم: If + had + V3, would have + V3.
نقل قول غیرمستقیم: He said (that)… / She asked if…
howToBuild: چالش را بگو و یک راه‌حل فرضی اضافه کن (If…, would…).
با مدال‌ها درباره علت‌ها حدس بزن (might/must).
برای واقعی‌تر شدن از reported speech استفاده کن.
در پایان نتیجه یا درسِ داستان را بگو.
examples: اگر The friends زودتر smartphone را چک کرده بود، اشتباه را جلوگیری می‌کرد.
ممکن است تحت فشار باشند، اما باید happy بمانند.
سرپرست گفت که هر جزئیاتی مهم است.
